original_text: You will throw them into the air, and the wind will blow them away in all directions! You will be happy with what the Lord has done for you. You will boast that the Holy God of Israel is your God. You will throw them into the air,
korean_text: 네가 그들을 까부른즉 바람이 그들을 날리겠고 회오리바람이 그들을 흩어 버릴 것이로되 너는 여호와로 말미암아 즐거워하겠고 이스라엘의 거룩한 이로 말미암아 자랑하리라

sentences.original_text: You will throw them into the air
and the wind will blow them away
You will be happy with what the Lord has done for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 주께서 행하신 일로 기뻐할 것이며

sentences.original_text: You will boast that the Holy God of Israel is your God.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 거룩하신 하나님이 네 하나님이심을 자랑하리라

sentences.original_text: You will throw them into the air,
